title: 1999/305/EC: Commission Decision of 19 April 1999 repealing certain decisions authorising the United Kingdom to restrict the marketing of seed of certain varieties of agricultural plant species (notified under document number C(1999) 1007)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 19 April 1999
repealing certain decisions authorising the United Kingdom to restrict the marketing of seed of certain varieties of agricultural plant species
(notified under document number C(1999) 1007)
(1999/305/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
